description.value:
You unleash a roar so loud that it's felt as deeply as it's heard. All creatures within a @Template[type:emanation|distance:15] take 8d6 sonic damage and must attempt a Fortitude save against the higher of your class DC or spell DC. This damage increases by 2d6 at 14th level and every 2 levels thereafter.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes half damage.

Failure The creature takes full damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stunned]{Stunned 1}. If the creature is adjacent to you, they're also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Deafened] for 1 round.

Critical Failure The creature takes double damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stunned]{Stunned 2}. If the creature is adjacent to you, they're also deafened for 1 minute.
